content:
Due to awesome work by https://github.com/pasa, we how have a simple hierarchical profiler.

use export RA_PROFILE='*>10' to profile all things (*) which run longer than 10ms

We have a couple of profiling points already; https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/pull/1146/commits/c4a5aa45dc480792b24535ee6739a4e9a15e8aa8
